Enter one or more measuring points to lo: Enter one or more measuring points to load data for.
Error loading data from BfS Server: Error loading data from BfS Server
Federal Office for Radiation Protection: Federal Office for Radiation Protection (Bundesamt für Strahlenschutz, BfS)
If enabled, additional states for the co: If enabled, additional states for the cosmic and terrestrial ADR components will be used.
If this is enabled and a history for a v: If this is enabled and a history for a value state is configured, the adapter tries to load missing history values for the last 7 days to fill up the history.
Maintenance work, reconstruction of the: Maintenance work, reconstruction of the site, malfunctions of transmitters, malfunctions of probes and regular radiological testing of the probes may lead to a short-term or long-term downtime of measuring stations.
Please wait while loading data from BfS: Please wait while loading data from BfS server …
See also detailed information from the B: See also detailed information from the BfS.
The intensity of the local dose rate is: The intensity of the local dose rate is sometimes affected by external factors. These include rain, snow and wind.
The ODL measuring network of the Federal: The ODL measuring network of the Federal Office for Radiation Protection (Bundesamt für Strahlenschutz, BfS) monitor the natural radiation exposure using about 1700 ODL measuring stations.
Timeout for each request to the server i: Timeout for each request to the server in seconds. Default is 30.
When you type, a search will be done by: When you type, a search will be done by the identifier, the zip code and the name.
You have selected more than %s measuring: You have selected more than %s measuring points, so the history loading feature will be disabled.
You may also enter a valid 9-digit ident: You may also enter a valid 9-digit identifier for measuring points not listed by the search.
